import React,{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const years=Array.from({length:10},(_,i)=>2016+i);const regions=["North","South","East","West","Central"];// Sample data object
const initialData=Object.fromEntries(years.map(year=>[year,Object.fromEntries(regions.map(region=>[region,"N"]))]));const App=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState(initialData);const[year,setYear]=useState(2016);const handleInput=(y,r,val)=>{if(val==="Y"||val==="N"){setData({...data,[y]:{...data[y],[r]:val}});}};const overlays={North:{top:"10%",left:"30%",bg:"rgba(255,0,0,0.4)"},South:{top:"60%",left:"30%",bg:"rgba(0,255,0,0.4)"},East:{top:"35%",left:"60%",bg:"rgba(0,0,255,0.4)"},West:{top:"35%",left:"10%",bg:"rgba(255,255,0,0.4)"},Central:{top:"35%",left:"35%",bg:"rgba(255,0,255,0.4)"}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"map-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:year}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"map",style:{backgroundImage:"url('/basin.png')"},children:regions.map(r=>data[year][r]==="Y"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay",style:{top:overlays[r].top,left:overlays[r].left,backgroundColor:overlays[r].bg},children:r},r):null)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setYear(Math.max(2016,year-1)),children:"Prev"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setYear(Math.min(2025,year+1)),children:"Next"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Year"}),regions.map(r=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:r},r))]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:years.map(y=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:y}),regions.map(r=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:data[y][r],onChange:e=>handleInput(y,r,e.target.value.toUpperCase()),maxLength:1})},r))]},y))})]})})]});};export default App;
